question: Who among the following disciple of Derozio questioned about the sacredness of the Ganges?
explanation: Rasik Krishna Mallick was one of the famous disciples of Derozio. He worked in Hare School which was founded by David Hare. In the year 1820, while appearing in the Supreme Court (Calcutta) as a witness in some cases, he said: \"I do not believe in the sacredness of the Ganges\".
